interpretation: The "sun with face" card represents joy, vitality, and positivity. It signifies a time of abundance and success, where everything is going well and there is a sense of fulfillment and happiness. This card encourages you to embrace your inner light and radiate positivity to those around you. It is a reminder to be confident in your abilities and to trust in the universe to provide you with all that you need. Bask in the warmth of the sun and let its energy fill you up with renewed strength and optimism. This card can also indicate a need for self-care and nurturing, as well as a call to take action and make the most of the opportunities that come your way. Associated keywords include: happiness, success, abundance, confidence, optimism, energy, vitality, self-care, action.
